description:
Takeo is about to face his greatest enemy, and we don’t mean the aliens! It’s Mizuha Miyama! She’s the large-chested drama queen who runs the Manga Club next door, and her greatest goal in life is to make Takeo miserable.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyodai Beigoma to, Mizuha-sama to, Shippai Mahou
The Giant Top, Mistress Mizuha, and Failed Magic
巨大ベーゴマと, 瑞葉先輩[さま]と, しっぱい魔法
